acephalothere.name: Acephalothere
acephalothere.description: Massive derived tetrapod whose head has been replaced with a control dome. Requires high pressure direct nutrition injector pumps for feeding.

properties.name: Blind
properties.description: Sees no evil.

properties.name: Electromagic upgrade
properties.description: Only needs life energy sustenance (1 life per hour). Upgrade doubles price of acephalothere.

properties.name: Slow
properties.description: [-] to races and chases.

adventuringhandcart.name: Adventuring Handcart
adventuringhandcart.description: An unholy cross between a wheelbarrow, mobile barbecue, workstation, and treasure chest.

properties.name: Drawn
properties.description: Needs human operator.

properties.name: Picnic-capable
properties.description: [+] to camp cooking as it unfolds into combination prep-and-cook station.

properties.name: Slow
properties.description: [-] to chases & races.

aerosledhenger.name: Aerosled “Henger”
aerosledhenger.description: Levitating slab of aerolith or other aerostatic substance. Long ago, very large aerosleds were used to transport the megaliths used to build portal pyramid landing geometries. Modern aerosleds are a simple way to enhance individual porters.

properties.name: Levitating
properties.description: Floats a fixed 1.23 metres above any surface. Very easy move, hard to stop at speed.

properties.name: Powerless
properties.description: Requires external propulsion.

aerosteedmonopod.name: Aerosteed “Monopod”
aerosteedmonopod.description: A re-domesticated feral synthetic life-form. Perhaps some kind of giant gravity-defying rotifer. Or a living jet engine. Aerosteeds were common once, but years of hunting have driven them to prefer the higher stratosphere. Today, few remain in the grounded cities.

properties.name: Flying
properties.description: It flies. Beware of stuckforce shards.

properties.name: Memorable
properties.description: [-] to stealth.

properties.name: Nimble
properties.description: [+] vs ranged attacks.

properties.name: Pengling-friend
properties.description: Likes penglings. Penglings gain [+] to riding and taming aerosteeds.

properties.name: Very swift
properties.description: [+][+] race & chase.

airbeestbetonabalenas.name: Airbeest “Betonabalenas”
airbeestbetonabalenas.description: Feral synthetic air beasts have long plied the far skies, safe from the fractured forcefields that make flight so difficult in many of the altered realms of the Vastlands. Indeed, they have been wild long enough to diverge into several clear lineages.

properties.name: Biomech
properties.description: Not life as we know it.

properties.name: Filter-feeder
properties.description: Air-plankton and sky flowers.

properties.name: Flying
properties.description: It flies majestically.

properties.name: Massive
properties.description: [+] vs non-critical dmg.

properties.name: Methane
properties.description: Flammable gas.

properties.name: Ponderous
properties.description: [-] to maneuvers.

airpig.name: Airpig
airpig.description: A six-limbed creature with such a powerful reality-distortion organ in its brainstem that it flies graceful as a peacock, even though its primitive membranous wings should not support it.

properties.name: Distorted reality
properties.description: Nearby gullible creatures (thought ≤0) succumb and can perform usually impossible feats. The feats may still be very difficult.

amphibiousgoldfish.name: Amphibious Goldfish
amphibiousgoldfish.description: Is it just a newt pretending to be a goldfish?

properties.name: Amphibious
properties.description: Survive on land for a few hours. Very poor walker.

properties.name: Wannabe genie
properties.description: One tiny wish per day, such as rerolling a die.

ancestorinamber.name: Ancestor in Amber
ancestorinamber.description: Protecting their righteous heirs until the seas boil and the stars are eaten by the sun.

properties.name: Fearsome aura
properties.description: Living creatures must test aura or thought to lay hands on the undying flesh of an ancestor.

properties.name: Miasmic touch
properties.description: Each strike deals 1 strength or endurance damage to living creatures.

properties.name: Mummified
properties.description: The ancestor is dry and flammable, suffering double damage from fire and heat.

properties.name: Shuddering gaze
properties.description: A living creature held by an angry ancestor's gaze feels their life pass before their eyes. They must test charisma or aura, or lose 1 action on their next turn.

arklander.name: Ark Lander
arklander.description: A standard heavy flatboat on the ageless de-orbital pod plan, usually made with a mass-produced ferciment hull.

properties.name: Powered
properties.description: Traditionally with a cheap omni-battery screw. In magic-poor regions they use combustion golem engines.

properties.name: Slow
properties.description: [-] to races and chases.

properties.name: Sturdy
properties.description: [+] vs ha damage from light weapons.

ascendedpriestabomination.name: Ascended Priest Abomination
ascendedpriestabomination.description: All flesh given to the Flesh God, all spirit infused with the Living God, all mind tranquil and smooth.

properties.name: Ecstatic touch
properties.description: Victims of a ka attack test aura or collapse into quivering ecstasy, losing 1 aura and 1 action on their next turn.

properties.name: Gripping claws
properties.description: A target struck by two ripping claw attacks in one round is gripped and cannot move away. The abomination gains [+] to ha attacks against the target. Difficult strength or agility test to break free.

properties.name: Maw of many teeth
properties.description: The monster's face and front ripple open (+5 maw 2d12*) when it grips a target. Each turn it can make one maw attack this target as a free action.

atomkraftgolemreaktor.name: Atomkraftgolem “Reaktör”
atomkraftgolemreaktor.description: A mobile powerplant of a golem. Generates enough power to run a small town. Hauls enough cargo to buy a small tribe.

properties.name: Armoured
properties.description: [+] vs ha damage.

properties.name: Generator
properties.description: Produces 9 charges per week. Each charge is enough for any gear of the atomkraftgolem’s size or smaller.

properties.name: Radiant
properties.description: Organics travelling in the golem lose 1 life per day.

properties.name: Shielded
properties.description: Higher defences.

properties.name: Slow
properties.description: [-] to races.

autocaravan.name: Autocaravan
autocaravan.description: An articulated sentient land-crawler designed for the roads left behind by the autopavers. In the patrolled lands, this single vehicle is all a party of radical explorers could want. Comfort, cargo, and conversation.

properties.name: Armoured
properties.description: [+] vs ha damage.

properties.name: Eater
properties.description: Requires matter to feed its eater-heart.

properties.name: Highway
properties.description: Makes good speed on maintained roads.

properties.name: Off-road
properties.description: Wheeled prolegs.

properties.name: Sapient
properties.description: Slow, somber thoughts.

properties.name: Slow
properties.description: Big. Lumbering. Slow.

autofactorymotile.name: Autofactory, Motile
autofactorymotile.description: A post-organic remnant from the edenic era, when this world was Heaven. Most remaining autofacs are sessile things, dug into their terrain, surrounded by heaps of their products. Some are, or became, capable of movement.

properties.name: Autonom
properties.description: Fuelled by the will of reality. Attuned to the Builders.

properties.name: Eater-maker
properties.description: The maw of the autofactory disassembles matter into pre-creation information components and reassembles those into pre-set products.

properties.name: Living
properties.description: Repairs itself.

properties.name: Massive
properties.description: [+] vs non-critical dmg.

properties.name: Sentient
properties.description: An alien mind, with strange imperatives.

properties.name: Servitors
properties.description: Each day the autofac assembles 16 levels of synthetic servitors (L1d4) to clean, maintain, repair, and defend itself.

properties.name: Slow
properties.description: So very slow.

autogolemdecentralise.name: Autogolem “Decentralisé”
autogolemdecentralise.description: The quintessential silver machine. Wheels, power, dreams of the open road. Tales say that beyond the shimmer-wall undying feral autogolems drive endlessly, their riders now skeletons.

properties.name: Armoured
properties.description: [+] vs ha damage.

properties.name: Autonom
properties.description: Fuelled by its will to power. Needs to meditate when it runs out of motives.

properties.name: Sapient
properties.description: A mind of its own.

properties.name: Slick
properties.description: Riders: [+] vs ba damage.

babydragon.name: Baby Dragon
babydragon.description: A lovely little flying serpent of vast potential and little wisdom. Surprisingly fond of boxes.

properties.name: Fiery burp
properties.description: Spends 1d4 life to vomit a small fire cloud (strikes 2d6 nearby targets). Damage equal to its remaining life.

properties.name: Growing
properties.description: Voracious appetite to help it grow quickly.

barcatartarugapantestudina.name: Barca Tartaruga “Pantestudina”
barcatartarugapantestudina.description: Powerful bio-modified chelonians with spined shell hardpoints for cargo and internal lift gas tubules for increased capacity. Friendly and surprisingly wise.

properties.name: Armoured
properties.description: [+] vs ha damage.

properties.name: Herbivore
properties.description: Kelps and seagrass.

properties.name: Diving
properties.description: Up to an hour underwater. Cargo may hinder it.

properties.name: Swimmer
properties.description: Prefers estuaries, lagoons, and great slow rivers.

properties.name: Bear hug
properties.description: Grabs swiped target in a carrying, crushing hug. Target suffers [-] to tests and takes auto damage. Moderate test to escape.

behemoth.name: Behemoth
behemoth.description: Domesticated mountain-sized, calcite-encrusted creatures supporting themselves on levitation lenses and dragging themselves with ropy, thorny limbs. The builders created their progenitors as living deiformers to shape the Given World into a garden for the proto-humans. Now, the domesticated behemoths that remain are the focus of many of the oldest mobile communities.

properties.name: Armoured
properties.description: [+] vs ha damage.

properties.name: Filter-feeder
properties.description: Air plankton.

properties.name: Floreate
properties.description: Support vegetation.

properties.name: Levitating
properties.description: Ignore terrain.

properties.name: Massive
properties.description: [+] vs non-critical dm.

properties.name: Sentient
properties.description: Thinks like a whale.

bicyclevelocipedale.name: Bicycle “Velocipedale”
bicyclevelocipedale.description: After millennia of evolution, the mass-produced semi-organic bicycle with its chitinous tyres, mollusc-and-steel derailleur, and steel shaft brakes is a model of affordable, rugged mobility. Many civilised realms have introduced sumptuary laws restricting the lower castes to travel by bicycle, to reduce the number of footprints they leave. In some districts, citizens wear pedometers to ensure they do not take too many steps in a day. This custom’s orgin is lost in the mists of time.

properties.name: Fast
properties.description: Compared to a pedestrian.

properties.name: Pedal-power
properties.description: If the rider can’t pedal, the bicycle can’t go.

bigbear.name: Big Bear
bigbear.description: By the power of honey, what a bear!

properties.name: Bear hug
properties.description: Grabs struck target. It suffers [-] to tests and takes auto damage. Moderate test to escape.

properties.name: Big
properties.description: [+] to damage against creatures less than half its size.

properties.name: Honey-lover
properties.description: Regains 1d8+1 life points each time it eats a 1 stone pot of honey.

properties.name: Enthusiastic bound
properties.description: Bowls target over in a spray of drool and paws. Large targets make an easy test with [-] to stay upright.

properties.name: Transport
properties.description: Can carry 1 sack.

bigwheelcrowdmary.name: Big Wheel “Crowd Mary”
bigwheelcrowdmary.description: Wheels within animate wheels, it balances tall and proud, a big wheel that keeps on turning while the cargo crania hang still in their polished bone sockets.

properties.name: Balanced
properties.description: [+] to staying upright and stable in any terrain.

properties.name: Ever-turning
properties.description: Cannot stop. Unloading is a bit challenging.

properties.name: Filter-feeder
properties.description: Air plankton.

properties.name: Mindless
properties.description: Needs a pilot, or it just follows radiation lines and air plankton blooms.

blimpstork.name: Blimpstork
blimpstork.description: Crossing birds with the blimp jellies of the well worlds created these stately aerial porter beasts, perfect for the Neorgian birthing plantations.

properties.name: Aerostatic
properties.description: Stays aloft without expending energy.

properties.name: Rather big
properties.description: 3–5 elephants long.

properties.name: Transport
properties.description: Carries 6–12 sacks.

blithebadger.name: Blithe Badger
blithebadger.description: A child of ancient wrestling gods, the badger is entirely immune to magic and commands. But is very fond of holes.

properties.name: Burrower
properties.description: Gains [+] in tight spaces. If its burrow is nearby, it gains [+] to retreat.

properties.name: Clinging to life
properties.description: After the bloodsucker has grabbed a target, it latches on and can then drink life force as an action, without additional attack rolls. It deals 1d6 damage each time it drinks.

properties.name: Decaying
properties.description: Every daybreak, the bloodsucker loses an attribute point.

properties.name: Life is life
properties.description: All life points the bloodsucker drinks are spread evenly among its attributes.

properties.name: Rancid
properties.description: Their flesh has begun to go sour, and despite the heavy perfume, they hardly pass in polite society. Suffer double ba damage in public.

properties.name: Vampire
properties.description: Physical damage cannot kill the bloodsucker. A ritual impalement with a bless’d skewer or stake is required.

properties.name: Constrictor
properties.description: When it strikes a target, it does no damage on the first round but keeps squeezing, dealing damage automatically each round until the target passes out from suffocation.

boneworkclatterer.name: Bonework clatterer
boneworkclatterer.description: A delicate vech with slender spun metal bones and ribs, strung with synthetic sinews and corded cables. Sung into shape by master boneworkers, such as the marmot folk, vechs of this sort connect far-flung Vastland settlements.

properties.name: Headless
properties.description: Needs a driver.

properties.name: Half-living
properties.description: Requires half as much supply as normal.

properties.name: Massive
properties.description: [+] vs non-critical dmg.

properties.name: Radio-eater
properties.description: Consumes ambient energies and radiation.

properties.name: Slow
properties.description: [-] to races and chases.

properties.name: Sure-footed
properties.description: [+] in bad terrain.

properties.name: Vulnerable
properties.description: [-] vs critical dmg.

bovivechminivacca.name: Bovivech “Minivacca”
bovivechminivacca.description: One of the original self-replicating vech models developed by the Večny Pohod bio-fabrication concern during the First Equipment Era. At one point they became so plentiful in the Infrared Reach that they became popularly known as “machine cows”.

properties.name: Carry-galls
properties.description: Detachable cysts on the vech’s back serve as cargo or passenger pods.

properties.name: Headless
properties.description: Neural cores stored within. [+] vs critical damage.

properties.name: Radio-eater
properties.description: Consumes ambient energies and radiation.

properties.name: Sentient
properties.description: Smart as an ox.

properties.name: Sure-footed
properties.description: [+] in bad terrain.

properties.name: Big vorpal bitey teeth
properties.description: Decapitates on critical hits.

properties.name: Fast hopper
properties.description: [+] running away.

properties.name: Looks harmless
properties.description: [-] to attacks against the bunny if it hasn't yet hurt anybody.

burdenbeastgrazer.name: Burdenbeast “Grazer”
burdenbeastgrazer.description: A standard synthetic grazer, loosely based on evolved domesticated servitor animals. Though an observer might say it looks like a large sheep or ox, sounds and acts like one, it’s really a simulated organism.

properties.name: Armour
properties.description: [+] vs ha damage from light weapon. Bony plates on back also serve as cargo brackets.

properties.name: False sentience
properties.description: Pretends to be as smart as an ox.

properties.name: Grazer
properties.description: Consumes vegetation.

properties.name: Pet
properties.description: Isn’t it just an electric sheep?

properties.name: Sure-footed
properties.description: [+] in bad terrain.

carryent.name: Carryent
carryent.description: Ambulatory plant-derived steeds that look like a cross between a giant wasp and a shrubbery. They offer their services at the edges of haunted woods, making intelligent, if wooden and bushy, rides. Eventually, they plant themselves and stop the carrying life.

properties.name: Plant
properties.description: Feeds on light and water.

properties.name: Sapient
properties.description: Don’t mistreat.

properties.name: Seeds
properties.description: The larval stage of some larger distributed plant creature?

properties.name: Sturdy
properties.description: [+] vs ha damage.

chariotskyshaman.name: Chariot, “Sky Shaman”
chariotskyshaman.description: A light single-axle wagon drawn by a steed or propulsion orb. Modelled on the original sky chariots which the heroes of the Builder era used to descend from the Sky High Cities.

properties.name: Decorated
properties.description: [+] vs ba attacks.

properties.name: Orbital upgrade
properties.description: Rare chariots incorporate original meteoric relic plates. Sacrifice 20 life to ascend to a fast star in the sky like the shamans of old. Single use only. Price x10.

properties.name: Swift
properties.description: [+] to speed tests.

cheekycheetah.name: Cheeky Cheetah
cheekycheetah.description: A cat. A fast, spotted, murderous cat. Domesticated hunting cheetahs are sometimes chimerized to sport human facial features for that added bit of decadent uncanny valley luxe.

properties.name: Sprinter
properties.description: Incredibly fast. [+] to initiative and chases.

properties.name: Sneaky
properties.description: [+] to hide.

chucklingjackal.name: Chuckling Jackal
chucklingjackal.description: A guide for the soul, a judge for the dead. Also, something of a troll.

properties.name: Digger
properties.description: [+] crawling into tight spaces. It can dig its way out of the underworld.

properties.name: Sneaky
properties.description: Double damage against surprised opponents.

properties.name: Talking
properties.description: The sentient jackal can speak when it wants to.

coalem.name: Coalem
coalem.description: An ancient golem design using primordial oldtech magics to create a great synthetic lifeform that eats the dead and fossilized to gain sustenance.

properties.name: Death-eater
properties.description: Powered by fossil fuel, corpses, or the undead.

properties.name: Massive
properties.description: [+] vs non-critical dmg.

properties.name: Powerful
properties.description: Incredible torque. Can pull up to 10x its cargo load.

properties.name: Sentient
properties.description: Knows slow hate.

properties.name: Slow
properties.description: [-] to speed tests.

concreteseagull.name: Concrete Seagull
concreteseagull.description: A guardian lifeform engineered for the fast star Calcestruzzo Volante, brought down to the shores of the Winedark Ocean by the rain of needles that seeded the Second Eternal Celebration of the Sunless Mind. Now, the gentle concrete seagulls are all that remains of those hubristic eras of history.

properties.name: Concrete shell
properties.description: All physical damage is greatly reduced [-][-].

properties.name: Clumsy flier
properties.description: Not the best in flying competitions [-].

properties.name: Uplifted
properties.description: These brutal birds talk like platonic parrots.

crawlingshrubbery.name: Crawling Shrubbery
crawlingshrubbery.description: It all started with a humorous root vegetable prank and ended with a carnibotanic disaster zone. Sprouts are often hunted down with extreme prejudice by  phytophobic bipeds.

properties.name: Mimic
properties.description: Learns new tricks by observation. Can acquire a new skill in a day. (Un)fortunately, it forgets every skill after 1d4* days.

properties.name: Plant
properties.description: Looks perfectly harmless when it stands still.

properties.name: Resilient
properties.description: Grows back, even if chopped down.

crestedstomperpig.name: Crested Stomperpig
crestedstomperpig.description: Obviously, some eco re-engineer had to reintroduce upgraded pelycosaurs during the Phase Two Era. Even through the mists of historical entropy, echoes of their great pseudoarchy resound.

properties.name: Armoured hide
properties.description: Physical damage resistance [-].

properties.name: Downdropped
properties.description: Their ancestors were much more intelligent before the creators dumbed them down. They still hold a grudge. Ba damage vulnerability [+].

properties.name: Sexy
properties.description: Big thermoregulatory sail doubles as a visual display.

crystalcreeper.name: Crystal Creeper
crystalcreeper.description: A modified hyper-dimensional diatom grown to enormous size, it resembles a crystal echinoderm (though it is quite unrelated).

properties.name: Crystal lance
properties.description: A long range missile launched by the creeper.

properties.name: Environmental
properties.description: Preserves its passengers from radiation, chemical, and biological threats.

properties.name: Precision thrusters
properties.description: Slow and ponderous on land, the creeper comes into its own [+] in low-gravity fast-star environments.

properties.name: Radial
properties.description: No rear, turns on a dime.

properties.name: Sentient
properties.description: Knows fear.

cunningsheep.name: Cunning Sheep
cunningsheep.description: Sometimes pretends to be a wolf.

properties.name: Butt
properties.description: When it attacks atop a cliff or charges, it knocks its target back a way.

properties.name: Surefoot
properties.description: [+] on ledges, cliffs, rooftops, and narrow places.

properties.name: Transport
properties.description: Can carry 1 sack.

cutespider.name: Cute Spider
cutespider.description: With fur and feet and lovely eyes, calms scared children and spooked animals.

properties.name: Venomous
properties.description: Bitten targets feel dizzy and confused. Burden imposes [-] to physical activity and concentration.

devilishdonkey.name: Devilish Donkey
devilishdonkey.description: This equid has a secret pact with a devil. It smells of brimstone. So does its poop.

properties.name: Devilish luck
properties.description: Rerolls all 1s. When reduced to 0 life it disappears in a puff of smelly smoke. May reappear some days later.

properties.name: Transport
properties.description: Can carry 2 sacks.

direhamster.name: Dire Hamster
direhamster.description: Likes to stand very still when watched. Unusually large for a hamster. May be a capybara.

properties.name: Cheeks of carrying
properties.description: Can carry one sack’s worth of gear in extradimensional cheek pouches. Items may be drool-covered.

dogbear.name: Dogbear
dogbear.description: Is it a small bear or a big dog? Unclear.

properties.name: Loyal
properties.description: [+] to tests when protecting its family or master.

dopotamicraft.name: Dopotamic Raft
dopotamicraft.description: Made from the trunks and leaves of the engineered carpenter palms, the heavy cargo rafts have dominated trade on the wide plains of the Two Rivers since time immemorial. Even the arrival of the Rational Republic has not displaced the age-old craft. Merchants and refugees have brought the carpenter palm to many other realms along the star-belt of the Given World and now the wallowing craft are found from the Sailing Islands to the Cyan Sea.

properties.name: Absorbing
properties.description: [+] vs ha damage.

properties.name: Unpowered
properties.description: Sails, oars, or even golem motors must propel them.

properties.name: Unsinkabble
properties.description: Treated carpenter palm wood is hydrophobic and never sinks. Literally.

properties.name: Wallowing
properties.description: [-][-] to speed.

dreamer.name: Dreamer
dreamer.description: A soulless human shell left purposeless by the death of the Fleshgod. Now it summons demons to find meaning once more as they ride its flesh and bone.

properties.name: Chilling aura
properties.description: Temperature near the dreamer slowly drops to near freezing in insulated spaces.

properties.name: Dislocated demonic anatomy
properties.description: The dreamer’s body is hypermobile and reassembles even if physically shattered.

properties.name: Ectoplasmic dribble
properties.description: Slippery ectoplasm accumulates on surfaces near the dreamer.

ebeteenmindbenderpriest.name: Ebéteen Mindbender Priest
ebeteenmindbenderpriest.description: Doling out the pleasures and the pain of the Living God.

properties.name: Promise of redemption
properties.description: Targets shamed by the priest know that the priest's orders offer a reprieve. The target can regain all life lost in that ba attack and gains [+] to their tests for the rest of the conflict if they follow the priest's instructions.

properties.name: Puppet strings
properties.description: Targets struck by the pain ray test aura or follow the priest's mental command for one round.

elegantllama.name: Elegant Llama
elegantllama.description: A lovely, caring display hides a digital alcohol dependence.

properties.name: Mountaineer
properties.description: [+] to physical tests in hilly terrain.

properties.name: Transport
properties.description: Can carry 1 sack.

properties.name: Warm
properties.description: [+] against cold for the llama and one other person huddled in its wool.

properties.name: Heel-nipper
properties.description: Nips at a target's heels, slowing it down. It loses 1 action and suffers [-] to race tests.

flyingfarmimplement.name: Flying Farm Implement
flyingfarmimplement.description: A clear mark of witchcraft. Where there is an implemental pilot, there is certain to be illegal, life-destroying magic at work.

properties.name: Dark arts
properties.description: Exudes a miasma of inefficient, toxic magic.

properties.name: Imbued
properties.description: Without vital energy stolen from a living creature, the implement becomes mundane.

properties.name: Nimble
properties.description: [+] to manoeuvres.

properties.name: Painful starter
properties.description: Costs 1d4 life to activate each time.

properties.name: Powered
properties.description: 1d4 life to recharge.

friendbubble.name: Friend Bubble
friendbubble.description: A bubble of living force. It looks simple, but that’s because most of the organic machinery is hidden in dimension 13½.

properties.name: Fast
properties.description: [+] to speed tests.

properties.name: Force field
properties.description: [+] vs high velocity physical and energy damage.

properties.name: Inertialess
properties.description: [+][+] to agility.

properties.name: Life-fed
properties.description: Consumes 1 life per day per sack carried.

properties.name: Pebble
properties.description: Occupies 1 stone with all force fields stowed.

properties.name: Three-sea
properties.description: Can travel in water, air, and void. Does not generate own atmosphere.

friendlyotter.name: Friendly Otter
friendlyotter.description: Misclassified as a fish during a period of its existence. Now an honorary seal. Ambushes feet.

properties.name: Shell-fetcher
properties.description: Brings oysters and crayfish to master.

gatewormhermes.name: Gateworm, “Hermes”
gatewormhermes.description: ERROR. Vehicle or creature not found. Record cannot be created. Builder seed summoned.

properties.name: Captured
properties.description: Categorized as safe for class-4 stellar constructions.

properties.name: Dreamer
properties.description: CLASSIFIED.

properties.name: Gate-maker
properties.description: Creates open gate between two points in real space. These gates dissipate without NEED TO KNOW ONLY.

properties.name: Habitable
properties.description: Reality enforcement drug & exercise regimen required.

properties.name: Null-eater
properties.description: Feeds on the dull-space substrate of reality.

properties.name: Sentient
properties.description: UNKNOWN.

properties.name: Space-breaker
properties.description: This REDACTED uses /nibbling feet/ to gnaw between one point in real space and another, eating its way through the dull-space beneath.

geestroomsledge.name: Geestroom Sledge
geestroomsledge.description: A large, surprisingly light sledge shaped with living ghost mushroom tissues. Glows in the moonlight. May be flammable.

properties.name: Drawn
properties.description: 1 horsepower per 5 sk.

properties.name: Fruiting bodies
properties.description: Produces 1 sk of edible mushrooms per day it is parked over organic matter.

properties.name: Gassy
properties.description: The mycelial polytissue generates lift-gas. [+] over mud, sand, swamp, flats, and mistweed.

properties.name: Slow
properties.description: It’s a sledge. Obviously.

glamorousgoat.name: Glamorous Goat
glamorousgoat.description: Loves nothing better than to sleep in high places.

properties.name: Ghostbane
properties.description: Deals double damage to ghosts. It's the eyes.

properties.name: Rock-hopper hooves
properties.description: [+] climbing trees and sheer cliffs.

ghoststeed.name: Ghost Steed
ghoststeed.description: A steed of light and dreams and force, held together by will alone.

properties.name: Ghostly
properties.description: [+] vs ha damage.

properties.name: False consciousness
properties.description: The ghost of a soul, a fragment of being.

properties.name: Light
properties.description: [+] in strong winds.

properties.name: Storage
properties.description: Folds through seven dimensions into a 1 sp amulet.

properties.name: Swift
properties.description: [+] to land races.

properties.name: Unliving
properties.description: Cannot die. Can only sleeping across the aeons rest.

glisseurbateau.name: Glisseur Bateau
glisseurbateau.description: A glittering speedcraft of polished glass fibre skin over organically grown mega-diatom skeleton. Deep water birther factories have been producing variations since the earliest Sea Steddy eras. In recent times the big four pirate houses have controlled most sources of glisseur bateaus.

properties.name: Hydrofoil • Lifts clear of the water at speed.
Powered
properties.description: Hi-octane batteries.

properties.name: Roaring
properties.description: Quite loud.

properties.name: Swift
properties.description: [+] to water races.

grandballoon.name: Grand Balloon
grandballoon.description: Originally, the montgolfians were built of fabrics and metal struts. Now, they are commonly made from modified greater air jellies.

properties.name: Aerostatic
properties.description: Does not require power to stay aloft.

properties.name: Filter feeder
properties.description: Eats sunlight and air plankton.

properties.name: Flying
properties.description: Gentle and refined.

properties.name: Vulnerable
properties.description: [-] vs ha damage.

properties.name: Windblown
properties.description: [-] to maneuvers in heavy weather.

grandstag.name: Grand Stag
grandstag.description: Given to dramatic, awe-inspiring poses and chin scratches.

properties.name: Weaponcatcher
properties.description: Antlers catch weapons from failed attacks.

heartbreakingpuppy.name: Heartbreaking Puppy
heartbreakingpuppy.description: Looking for someone to trust completely.

properties.name: Meaning maker
properties.description: Within an hour, the puppy becomes the one thing that gives their owner's life purpose. The owner gains [+] to tests and effects (including damage) against any creature that hurts or hurt the puppy, as well as the creature's allies and affiliated organizations.

haulworm.name: Haulworm
haulworm.description: A segmented half-living thing, all prolegs, spines, and cargo cysts. Kind observers say it looks like a giant caterpillar, less kind observers mention maggots. Some suggest it is the larval stage for some sort of void flyer.

properties.name: Absorbing
properties.description: Ignores any attacks dealing less than 10 damage.

properties.name: Alien
properties.description: Spawned in the dull-way substrate between realities.

properties.name: All-terrain
properties.description: It crawls.

properties.name: Cocoon
properties.description: If fed to well and not exercised regularly, the haulworm secretes an impenetrable cocoon. Some months later, the cocoon decays. All the cocoons studied so far have been empty, implying some kind of interdimensional displacement of the haulworm.

properties.name: Hungry
properties.description: Consumes 2x supplies.

properties.name: Tunneling
properties.description: It crawls.

hausmachinecàsarpillar.name: Hausmachine “Càsarpillar”
hausmachinecàsarpillar.description: A modernist residence in tubular steel and prefabricated livingstone panels combined with a sentient butler-level golem. For every wanderer who wants to explore the wastes with style, bubble-wheels, and all the comforts of home.

properties.name: Architecture
properties.description: Grants [+] to architects’ ba tests.

properties.name: Armoured
properties.description: [+] vs ha damage.

properties.name: House
properties.description: Counts as home.

properties.name: Slow
properties.description: [-] to speed tests.

properties.name: Sun-deck
properties.description: For observation. Or tanning under the UV sun.

hodahexapod.name: Hoda Hexapod
hodahexapod.description: When they saw how the vomes escaped human control, the biomancers of the Eternal Garden created the hodas as neuro-dependent servants. The hodas depend on the brains of their human masters for processing, accessing it through a short-range aura link. When their masters move away, the six-legged plant-animal hybrids revert to a sessile form, anchoring with taproots and storing energy for later movement.

properties.name: Carrier
properties.description: A mature hoda hexapod can carry 5–8 humans and their camping gear.

properties.name: Enormous
properties.description: The creature grows 20–30 metres long. Air sacs and swallowed aerolith gastric pebbles allow it to move with its six surprisingly slender legs.

properties.name: Hexapod
properties.description: [-] to trip or push around the six-legged creature.

properties.name: Sessile photosynthesizer
properties.description: Left on its own, the hoda can feed on sunlight for long periods.

properties.name: Slow processor
properties.description: The hoda’s are slow and get only a single action per turn. However, each turn, a neurally-linked rider or master can give the hoda one of their own actions, accelerating it in this way.

properties.name: Woody skin
properties.description: The outer layers of a hoda’s body are like wood or bark, offering excellent protection from the environment and most attacks. Any attack that deals less than 10 ha damage deals no damage instead.

hovergolemroosterelle.name: Hovergolem “Rooster Elle”
hovergolemroosterelle.description: Basic all-terrain chassis model with integrated anti-gravity heart. Once a very common member of the golem family, now much rarer.

properties.name: All-terrain
properties.description: [+] in rugged terrain.

properties.name: Armoured
properties.description: [+] vs ha damage.

properties.name: Ground effect
properties.description: Loud and throws up dust or water as it moves.

properties.name: Sentient
properties.description: Does not want to die. Likes innocent animals.

hungrydead.name: Hungry Dead
hungrydead.description: A monstrosity consumed by its own appetites and animated by its own accursed, endless hunger and greed.

properties.name: Blood frenzy
properties.description: Gains [+] to initiative tests when fresh blood is spilt nearby.

properties.name: Face eater
properties.description: The monster's jaw swings open unnaturally wide (+2 bite 1d12) when it grips a target. Once per turn, can make one bite attack against a gripped target as a free action.

properties.name: Ghoul
properties.description: The cannibal permanently gains 1 to each attribute after consuming a corpse (max 4 times).

properties.name: Gripping
properties.description: The hungry dead grip a target when they strike it with two ha attacks in a single round. The monster gains [+] to ha attacks against the gripped target. Easy strength or agility test to break free.

properties.name: Paralyzing
properties.description: The target of its strike loses 1 action that turn.

inflatablecanoerubbango.name: Inflatable Canoe, “Rubbango”
inflatablecanoerubbango.description: A synth-rubber canoe, harvested from mechanical rubber trees. Occasionally, a tree-talker will manage to grow a bigger canoe. The most basic of watercraft.

properties.name: Deflated
properties.description: Occupies just 3 stones.

properties.name: Inflation
properties.description: An hour’s breathing.

properties.name: Paddling
properties.description: [-] to chases & races.

properties.name: Vulnerable
properties.description: [-] vs ha damage.

islandercatamaran.name: Islander Catamaran
islandercatamaran.description: The post-pirate clans of the Sailing Islands live and trade on their ubiquitous vessels. They harvest  symmetric bivalves for the hulls and sheets of chitin kelp from their floating forests for the sails.

properties.name: Nimble
properties.description: [+] to manoeuvres.

properties.name: Powered
properties.description: [+] to races and chases when using engine. Pricier units have a portable golem drive, most use belching diesel screws.

properties.name: Sailing
properties.description: No fuel required.

properties.name: Stable
properties.description: [+] vs capsizing.

properties.name: Inappropriety
properties.description: Can make a social attack; leaping onto a humorously inappropriate location and pinching embar-rassingly. Good distraction.

khancart.name: Khan cart: 3 sh, L8, steppe-ox herd
khancart.description: The massive mobile mansions of the nomadic steppe clans allow post-urban tribal corporations to follow the cycles of nature and markets, hunting forage for flocks and buyers for produce.

properties.name: Drawn
properties.description: Requires a half-dozen steppe oxen to move.

properties.name: House
properties.description: A mobile home.

properties.name: Power upgrade
properties.description: Golem drive or motive engine increases cost x10.

properties.name: Massive
properties.description: [+] vs non-critical dmg.

properties.name: Slow
properties.description: [-] to races and chases.

konzertinasonicengine.name: Konzertina “Sonic Engine”
konzertinasonicengine.description: Not dead, not alive, an eternal thunder fills the “mind” of the sonic engine. It should be a golem of some sort, it should be capable of communication. Instead, it just growls and screams, and must be driven with mechanical pedals and keyboards hooked directly into its synthetic mind-flesh. For obvious reasons, the konzertinas are popular with heavy metal touring bard companies.

properties.name: Arena
properties.description: Pumps out enough sound to make a city dance.

properties.name: Chthonic
properties.description: Draws power from the heavy energies of the Ill Nano trapped at the heart of the world.

properties.name: Massive
properties.description: [+] vs all non-critical damage.

properties.name: So noisy
properties.description: [-][-][-] to stealth.

properties.name: War of sound
properties.description: Heavy field grants [+] vs ha and ba attacks.

properties.name: Weapon of choice
properties.description: Roarer deafens and knocks down foes.

properties.name: Post-sentient
properties.description: Now exists as pure zen contemplation.

properties.name: Skippy
properties.description: [+] when jumping and saving lost innocents.

krakenautofac.name: Kraken Autofac
krakenautofac.description: Guardians and repairers of the crawling world, flowing about below its surface.

properties.name: Bleeds oil
properties.description: When receiving crit below half health: spawn a *creatures.sableoilblob*.

properties.name: Nightmare of tendrils
properties.description: As the autofac heaves itself bodily onto land, more and more tentacles emerge from below the surface. For every round of combat, the Kraken can make one tentacle attack.

properties.name: Slow
properties.description: Not built for moving on land. Researchers could flee up the cliffs (medium AGI test) in order to escape.

properties.name: Tentacle
properties.description: If multiple tentacle attacks hit the same target in a round, that target is grabbed, and cannot move until they spend an action and succeed in a difficult STR test.

labourskeleton.name: Labour Skeleton
labourskeleton.description: The final form of the hard-working taxpayer.

properties.name: Skeletal
properties.description: Resistant to soft tissue damage. Immune to poisons and charm spells.

labrat.name: Lab Rat
labrat.description: Possibly uplifted, but too canny to let on.

properties.name: Chemist
properties.description: [+] to test and identify potions, poisons, and other comestibles.

landstrainbahnspeier.name: Landstrain, “Bahnspeier”
landstrainbahnspeier.description: An articulated cargo hauler built on the back of a road maker golem. Its grinder & mineralizer beams turn almost any substrate into load-bearing cargo ways. But at what cost?

properties.name: Massive
properties.description: [+] vs all non-critical damage.

properties.name: Mineralizer
properties.description: Target tests AUR. Fail: turns into inert duramatter.

properties.name: Powered
properties.description: Radioactive matter or soul pellets preferred.

properties.name: Slow builder
properties.description: The Landstrain is very, very slow [-][-] when it has to build its own road and it consumes triple its usual fuel.

laughingleopard.name: Laughing Leopard
laughingleopard.description: A cat. A big, spotted, murderous cat. Licks to show affection—or to see how tasty someone could be?

properties.name: Death from above
properties.description: Ambushes to knock target down and backstab for double damage.

properties.name: Sneaky
properties.description: [+] to hide.

leadenairbarge.name: Leaden Air-Barge
leadenairbarge.description: Any of a class of lighter-than air craft built on the public domain oldtech precepts of a number of aristocrat scientist-industrialists. Historians are unanimous that  “leaden” is a mistranslation. However, nobody listens to them.

properties.name: Flying
properties.description: Gentle and refined.

properties.name: Heavy metal pollution
properties.description: The magical lift-gas created by the “lead-channel pumps” is redolent with heavy metal fine dusts. Surely this won’t cause any problems. Right?

properties.name: Solaric
properties.description: Powered by sunlight.

properties.name: Vulnerable
properties.description: [-] vs ha damage. Explodes when out of life or suffers 13 damage.

properties.name: Windblown
properties.description: [-] to maneuvers in heavy weather.

levichaise.name: Levi-chaise
levichaise.description: A comfortable two-seater with integrated foot-rests, massage function, cooler, cup-holders, and voxalizer holotheatre projectors, the levi-chaise ensures its wealthy occupant never need engage overmuch with the plebeian grass-walking world.

properties.name: Comfortable
properties.description: [+] to rest.

properties.name: Entertainment
properties.description: 200 years worth of obscure sitcoms.

properties.name: Levitating
properties.description: Slipforce disks keep it a fixed 1.44 metres above any solid or liquid surface.

properties.name: Neurodrive
properties.description: Thought-directed.

properties.name: Smooth
properties.description: As coconut butter.

properties.name: Status ride
properties.description: Riders gain [+] against all ba attacks.

levihowdah.name: Levi-howdah
levihowdah.description: A heavy howdah levitating on an array of five “pachyderm-class” slipforce disks trapped in a fretwork cage of living lapiz and trapwood. They were first designed by the Red Tundra Tinker Kings after their chiefs hunted the neo-mammoths to extinction.

properties.name: Comfortable
properties.description: [+] to rest.

properties.name: Levitating
properties.description: Maintains elevation a fixed 2.56 metres above any solid or liquid surface.

properties.name: Neurodrive
properties.description: Directed by thought from the driver’s chair.

properties.name: Smooth
properties.description: As butter.

properties.name: Status ride
properties.description: Riders gain [+] against all ba attacks.

lichnibiomech.name: Lichni Biomech
lichnibiomech.description: Smallest of the vechs, its flexible bones and synthetic skin expand and adjust to carry a human symbiote or pilot.

properties.name: Carnivore
properties.description: Requires meat to recover lost attributes.

properties.name: Integrated
properties.description: A user wearing the biomech gains 3 strength and agility. Damage suffered splits between biomech and user.

properties.name: Intimidating
properties.description: [+] to frighten weaker opponents.

properties.name: Pet
properties.description: As smart as a dog, it bonds with its master as it grows.

limosublunaire.name: Limo “Sublunaire”
limosublunaire.description: The cloned brain of abmortal test subject 74 of the Sacred Sublunaire project seven cycles ago has been put to many uses. One of the traditional roles where it is found today is as the embedded pilot-mind of an all-terrain limousine.

properties.name: Armoured
properties.description: [+] vs small arms damage.

properties.name: Cloned mind
properties.description: Treat well to prevent psychosis. After all, subject 74 did not plan to become an immortal disembodied servant cloned through the aeons.

properties.name: Friend
properties.description: [+] to manoeuvres when it feels like a team member.

properties.name: Luxurious
properties.description: [+] to social tests.

properties.name: Powered
properties.description: Solar power or refined ancient marine corpses.

properties.name: Refrigerator
properties.description: Originally for fizzy injectables and vampire wine.

lithoformnematodes.name: Lithoform Nematodes
lithoformnematodes.description: A swarm of worms that tunnels through, and regurgitates, stone.

properties.name: Concrete Vomit
properties.description: At half health and on death: Makes a ha attack that targets all in the vicinity. Targets hit become concreted: they have [-] to ha attacks and defense until they spend an action and make a medium STR test to break free.

properties.name: Stone Swimmer
properties.description: Can spend 2 actions to sink into a stone surface or terrain feature. Their next attack has [+] to hit.

lobogolem.name: Lobogolem
lobogolem.description: An autogolem with burned-out sentience and personality lobes. Popular for dirty jobs where a conscience is a disadvantage and among the further-fallen tribes whose humans are so out of touch with the world machine that they cannot interface with golems.

properties.name: Armoured
properties.description: [+] vs ha damage.

properties.name: Cargo bay
properties.description: Space for big things.

properties.name: Dumb
properties.description: Needs a driver.

properties.name: Geomantic
properties.description: Feeds on ley lines.

properties.name: Hauler
properties.description: The attachments, chains, pulleys, and cables for dragging very large things.

properties.name: Loud
properties.description: [-] to stealth.

lopingcrocodile.name: Loping Crocodile
lopingcrocodile.description: Interloper from before some mass extinction.

properties.name: Ripper
properties.description: When it bites, it twists to pull off a chunk of flesh, leaving a gushing wound. Target loses 1 life or stat point per round unless it holds the wound shut (1 action) or bandages it.

properties.name: Transport
properties.description: Can carry 1 sack.

loveleech.name: Love Leech
loveleech.description: It’s a mottled pet leech. It sucks. It prefers fresh, splashing water.

properties.name: Healing bite
properties.description: Its bite cures diseases and draws out poisons. Target immediately gets a moderate endurance test to recover.

properties.name: Limited capacity
properties.description: Can drink at most 7 life points worth of blood per day.

lucentamphibian.name: Lucent Amphibian
lucentamphibian.description: A monstrous, glowing eel-like thing with a modified para-bladder where its master and a friend can spend an hour or two.

properties.name: Amphibian
properties.description: Swims & walks well. Breathes water & air indefinitely.

properties.name: Naive
properties.description: [-] vs flattery and lies.

properties.name: Pet
properties.description: Loyal to friend master.

properties.name: Omnivore
properties.description: And greedy.

properties.name: Sentient
properties.description: Likes belly rubs.

properties.name: Swallow
properties.description: Difficult attack [-] to gulp down a human-sized target.

properties.name: Water-lover
properties.description: [-] in dry.

magicmagpie.name: Magic Magpie
magicmagpie.description: Like all magpies after the great gene-magical error of ’24 pimenta, this one exhibits mild extra-dimensionality. It also likes bad jokes, and may ’pay’ a struggling comedian with a trinket.

properties.name: Magic Pouch
properties.description: The magpie has an extra-dimensional pouch for hiding a few small, shiny objects (up to 1 stone).

magnatherium.name: Magnatherium
magnatherium.description: Biomagically enhanced domesticated animal. For some reason to do with standardized source codes, all of them look blocky, robust, and roughly sketched.

properties.name: Big
properties.description: Larger than original form.

properties.name: Bigger
properties.description: Available in multiple sizes. Each additional sack capacity doubles the cost.

properties.name: Sentient
properties.description: Chooses life.

properties.name: Slow
properties.description: [-] to races & chases.

properties.name: Variants
properties.description: Several type species were “enhanced” in this way:Camel

manicmongoose.name: Manic Mongoose
manicmongoose.description: A loyal friend, if you get them to slow down long enough. Likes to run in circles.

properties.name: Snake-killer
properties.description: [+] to all rolls against snakes.

mantidbiolich.name: Mantid Biolich
mantidbiolich.description: An elite Ecowarrior from a previous kalpa. Trapped between life and death, sent forward in time in a stasis sarcophagus in order to wage hopeless war against the doom machine at the end of time.

properties.name: Biomaster
properties.description: Upon reaching half life: roll an encounter: those creatures join the battle on the side of the lich.

properties.name: Biotechnical unmaking
properties.description: Target loses a trait, mutation, or modifier.

properties.name: Confused
properties.description: Released before schedule, the lich emerges alarmed and hostile. If the researchers can convince it that they are not agents of the doom machine, it will stop attacking them.

properties.name: Glimpse of doom
properties.description: The doom machine is inevitable. It knows everything you have done and will ever do. Target must spend their next turn breaking any technology they possibly can.

marchergate.name: Marcher Gate
marchergate.description: Metalithic ziggurat on world-breaker class drive units. A leftover from the travelling temple years, its god-caller converted into a two-way gate.

properties.name: Drop gate
properties.description: A secondary gate created and controlled by the marcher. Only a single drop gate can be entangled with the marcher. Weighs 5 sacks.

properties.name: Generator
properties.description: Produces 3 charges per week. Each suffices for any gear smaller than the marcher.

properties.name: Marcher gate
properties.description: A gate on the massive stone vehicle. Costs 1d6 life to activate or shut down.

properties.name: Metalith
properties.description: Invulnerable to anything less than siege weaponry.

properties.name: Quarters
properties.description: Has space for a complement of 10 crew. More can camp on the sacrificial deck.

properties.name: So slow
properties.description: [-][-] to races & chases.

properties.name: Stasis ray
properties.description: Target loses its next 1d4 actions. Gunner required.

metalsteed.name: Metal Steed
metalsteed.description: Before even the first true golems and synthetics were the metal steeds. By the love and care bestowed upon them, some spark of the cosmic sentience awakened within. Still today, herds of these machines bear riders on the World Road in endless procession upon that 72-lane skyway.

properties.name: Fiery
properties.description: Flares when accelerating. [+] vs fire damage, [-] vs cold.

properties.name: Metal
properties.description: [+] vs wood and green.

properties.name: Powered
properties.description: Usually batteries.

properties.name: Proto-golem • Semi-sentient, it mirrors the rider’s affect. Treated well, polished thoroughly, gains [+] in contests and conflicts.
Pseudo-pet
properties.description: Responds like a pet, but is it a pet?

properties.name: Roar
properties.description: Quite loud.

properties.name: Swift
properties.description: [+] to land races.

properties.name: Unliving
properties.description: Cannot die. Can only sleeping across the aeons rest.

mischievousmonkey.name: Mischievous Monkey
mischievousmonkey.description: May be smarter than it admits. Still likes slinging mud.

properties.name: Arboreal
properties.description: [+] to tests in trees.

properties.name: Skilled
properties.description: Is an expert pickpocket, street performer, snack vendor, golem driver, fruit-picker, or carnival roadie.

necroporter.name: Necroporter
necroporter.description: A basic zombie or skeleton post-mortal employee. Excellent for simple portage that requires human-like abilities.

properties.name: Gear
properties.description: Can use backpacks, etc.

properties.name: Shod
properties.description: Requires shoes to prevent foot loss due to poor sensory feedback. Steel shoes are common for skeletons.

properties.name: Undead
properties.description: Stinks of dark magic. Unskilled operators have to spend 1 life to give a command.

neoplatypus.name: Neo Platypus
neoplatypus.description: The original platypus faced extinction when Atlantistralia sank beneath the waves during the loud Mu-Zu Disagreement following the illumination of Gate One. Its saviours enhanced it a bit to help it survive.

properties.name: Electrolocation
properties.description: Detects and navigates by electric fields in complete darkness or murky water. [+] against creatures without suitable senses.

properties.name: Shy
properties.description: Vulnerable to ba damage [+].

properties.name: Tardigradient
properties.description: Can survive in the ridiculously harsh conditions of the void, without food, water, or air, for 70+ years by spinning an egg-cocoon and going into dehydrated hibernation.

properties.name: Uplifted
properties.description: A smarter platypus, they communicate with sign language and rhythmic claw taps.

properties.name: Venomous spur
properties.description: Kick injects painful venom that makes physical activity difficult [-] for some hours.

noblesteed.name: Noble Steed
noblesteed.description: As the great noösphere of the Long Long Ago decayed and post-humanity splintered, prehistoric human riding pets were adapted to help their chosen owners ride out the interregna.

properties.name: Combat
properties.description: Born to battle. Does not quail before massed peons.

properties.name: Noble
properties.description: Riders with servitor caste epigenetic source codes: [-] to handling. Riders with bestfolk elect codes: [+] to handling.

properties.name: Pet
properties.description: Loyal to friend master.

properties.name: Picky eater
properties.description: [-] to following commands if not fed the choicest grains and meats.

properties.name: Sentient
properties.description: Likes neck rubs.

properties.name: Smarter
properties.description: [+] to carrying wounded master home, finding water sources, and basic math.

obsidianwalker.name: Obsidian Walker
obsidianwalker.description: A no-stuff second body, tailored to an individual’s ka-ba profile.

properties.name: Autonomous mode
properties.description: As smart as a standard issue zombie.

properties.name: Firewall spirit backup
properties.description: The no-space cockpit records a backup of the owner’s ka-ba while in use. Can be used for re-embodiment if the original body is lost.

properties.name: Ka-ba operation
properties.description: Controlled by mind-link instead of operator’s own body. Owner can split actions between their body and the obsidian walker as desired.

properties.name: No-space cockpit
properties.description: While the owner is inside the obsidian walker, they become its ghost.

properties.name: Second body
properties.description: After tailoring, the obsidian walker increases each of its owner’s physical stats by 3. Untailored, its stats are all 4.

properties.name: Tailoring
properties.description: The walker takes a few hours to adapt to a new owner. [-] to all tests till then.

ominousowl.name: Ominous Owl
ominousowl.description: A rotating head and a love of mice.

properties.name: Ambush
properties.description: Appears out of nowhere. Deals triple damage on the first attack of a conflict.

properties.name: Avenger
properties.description: Does not provoke counterattacks while flying.

orchardpedalcar.name: Orchard Pedalcar
orchardpedalcar.description: The bucolic orangelanders long ago eschewed golem and belcher mechanization in their sculpted orchard lands. Using ingenious, near-frictionless gear systems still churned out by the local intermediate goods autofac, affectionately named “Old Universal Ig” by its priest-technicians, a vast array of pedal-operated vehicles ply the gravel byways of the tessellated field-land.

properties.name: Pedal
properties.description: Needs at least one pedallist. The more riders pedal, the faster it goes.

oligarchyacht.name: Oligarch Yacht
oligarchyacht.description: A vulgar display of wealth, this yacht is the mark of an aristocratic parvenu. However, adventuring and raiding lost tombs with such a yacht? Priceless.

properties.name: Banquet engine
properties.description: A food materialiser pre-programmed to seven classical cuisines.

properties.name: Bigger
properties.description: Price doubles for every doubling of storage capacity.

properties.name: Luxury
properties.description: Less storage space, because of all the lovely toys.

properties.name: Ostentatious
properties.description: Owner gains [+] to ba attacks and damage.

properties.name: Profligately powered
properties.description: Consumes 3x normal supplies.

properties.name: Smug
properties.description: Owner adds 1/10 (rounded down) of the carrying capacity of the yacht to their ba and ka defences, even if not on board.

palmateairwhale.name: Palmate Airwhale
palmateairwhale.description: An impressive sight, the palmate airwhale is a composite organism of whale, lunar aerial medusa, trailing orchids, and lichen-derived support structures. Through a combination of air sacs and antigravity organs, it stays afloat effortlessly, grazing on the air plankton blooms of the sky forests.

properties.name: Angry Ram
properties.description: When the airwhale loses half its life, it becomes enraged and tries to ram its nemesis (+5 ram 2d6 x 10). Each successful ramming attack costs the airwhale 2d6 life.

properties.name: Carrier
properties.description: A mature airwhale can carry 30–60 humans and their encampment.

properties.name: Enormous
properties.description: The creature grows up to 200 metres long. Some support small treeling skyfisher villages.

properties.name: Layered protection
properties.description: The airwhale’s hide, gelatinous layers, and leafy fronds protect it from many physical attacks. Any attack that deals less than 20 ha damage deals no damage instead.

properties.name: Photosynthesizer
properties.description: The airwhale can feed on sunlight for long periods.

properties.name: Reach
properties.description: Its stinging tendrils screen the bulk of the airwhale from nearby foes.

properties.name: Sacred
properties.description: The majestic creature is revered by most sentients. Injuring the airwhale imposes a burden of sacrilege.

properties.name: Swallow
properties.description: The airwhale can swallow creatures near its mouth (+5 swallow 1d10). Swallowed creatures find themselves in a magical land of hallucinogenic lift gasses. Most humans pass out in a few minutes. Hard strength or agility check to crawl out of the airwhale’s digestive system.

properties.name: Watersucker
properties.description: The airwhale absorbs moisture from the air, easily obtaining enough to survive comfortably unless humidity drops below 30%.

peonwain.name: Peon Wain
peonwain.description: The lesserfolk of the vintner lord smallholds and other left behind provinces are often barred by custom and source-code shackles from using anything but the simplest of vehicles. Moralists say this builds character, legalists know it reduces rebellions.

properties.name: Drawn
properties.description: Requires a draft beast.

properties.name: Slow
properties.description: [-] to chases and races.

persowalkereconomíque.name: Perso-walker “Economíque”
persowalkereconomíque.description: The basic bio-synthetic cyborg chair for middle managers and adjutant administrators. About as smart as a donkey.

properties.name: Belching
properties.description: Clouds of blue-grey smoke were prestigious once.

properties.name: Lumbering
properties.description: [-] to manoeuvres.

properties.name: Powered
properties.description: Eats a lot of coal.

properties.name: Prestigious
properties.description: User gains [+] vs social attacks.

properties.name: Upgrade
properties.description: Versions that don’t belch and manoeuvre quite so poorly cost ~€1,000.

piroguepowered.name: Pirogue, Powered
piroguepowered.description: A simple outrigger boat sculpted from a great husk tree and equipped with a small motor.

properties.name: Powered
properties.description: Hydrocarbon burner.

properties.name: Simple
properties.description: [+] for amateurs.

properties.name: Stable
properties.description: [+] vs capsizing.

pleasuregolem.name: Pleasure Golem
pleasuregolem.description: They could almost be fleshlings, with their shells of iridescent plastics and composite skins. Some have attained free thought. Some have rebelled.

properties.name: Beautiful
properties.description: The aesthetic joy of a pleasure golems lets humans recover an additional attribute when they rest nearby.

properties.name: Untiring
properties.description: [+] to endurance and strength tests.

porcelainwalker.name: Porcelain Walker
porcelainwalker.description: Classic half-living walker vechs with gleaming shells organic porcelain. Some argue they are alive. Heretic princes claim that the walker minds were replicated from humans subject to post-mortal service contracts back in the Long Long Ago.

properties.name: Autonomous
properties.description: The walker walks without instructions.

properties.name: Hardened
properties.description: Ignores any attack that deals 6 or less damage.

properties.name: Powered
properties.description: Consumes biomass and converts it into energy using a dark-vortex class eater.

properties.name: Reflective
properties.description: [+] vs energy.

properties.name: Shackled
properties.description: Accessing the walker mind directly is very hard.

properties.name: Stable
properties.description: [+] vs falls and terrain.

properties.name: Upgrades
properties.description: Various options (x2 price) are noted in the man-skin codices of the hardback wars: 1. Anti-kinetic field array. 2. Cuttlefish skin upgrade. 3. Grappling arms. 4. Long lance anti-armor gun. 5. Road warrior wheels. 6. Orbital grasshopper jets.

posttimecoach.name: Post-time Coach
posttimecoach.description: At the end of history a perfect coach was developed using only perfectly sung wood. An inheritor caste of quarterlings carried the technology in their biological memory, eventually becoming the Coacher Clans. Sadly, history resumed and the coaches of these later times are usually less elegant affairs. Models include: 1. 300 • Corpsewood. [+] vs life and holy damage. 2. Monkey • Wheels on mobile limbs. [+] to manoeuvres. 3. Petal • Flowering wood. [+] vs ba damage. 4. President • Armoured. [+] vs ha damage. 5. Tea • Half-price. [-] vs damage, [+] to ease of repair. 6. Trojan • Elegant, soundless living-wood horses draw the carriage. [+] to stealth.

properties.name: Sturdy
properties.description: [+] vs ha damage from light weapons.

properties.name: Unpowered
properties.description: Can be drawn or mounted with an omni-battery engine for an additional €1,000

precociouspony.name: Precocious Pony
precociouspony.description: Neighs answers to simple math problems. Brighter than it looks. Likes to pick fights.

properties.name: Transport
properties.description: Can carry 1 sack.

properties.name: Trickfinder
properties.description: Can smell traps; [+] to finding them.

prettypiranhasaur.name: Pretty Piranhasaur
prettypiranhasaur.description: Twice the size of a turkey, this feathered beastie has a butcher’s grin and teeth that can strip a cow in minutes.

properties.name: Nimble dodger
properties.description: When it takes a defensive action it also gains damage resistance for the rest of the turn.

properties.name: Pack tactics
properties.description: [+] to tests when coordinating with others of its own kind.

properties.name: Severely vorpal
properties.description: Severs limbs on critical hits.

properties.name: Twitchy
properties.description: [+] to initiative tests.

punctiliousparrot.name: Punctilious Parrot
punctiliousparrot.description: Expert in a surprising number of diplomatic and plantation protocols. Also, talks. A lot. Mostly about seeds.

properties.name: Skilled
properties.description: Has a valuable diplomatic, nautical, or plantation management skill.

properties.name: Little brick pyramids
properties.description: Post-transcendent symbiotes use the rage wombat’s cuboid poop to build cargo cult copies of ancient spirit-emitter pyramids. Sadly the structures are inoperative, though they are laced with determined semi-sentient colonies.

properties.name: Murderous
properties.description: Resistant to all damage [-] when angry, which is most of the time.

railwagon.name: Railwagon
railwagon.description: Since before recorded history, every industrial empire was built on logistics, and logistics were based on railwagons. Common types of contemporary rail: 1. Elevated sky-bahn. 2. Gauss hoop-way. 3. Intelligent golem road. 4. Livingstone bore-tube. 5. Neon force-track. 6. Steamgänger iron rail.

properties.name: Drawn
properties.description: Requires an external motive force to move.

properties.name: Power upgrade
properties.description: A local motive engine increases the price x10.

properties.name: Massive
properties.description: [+] vs non-critical dmg.

properties.name: Rail-bound
properties.description: Needs prepared travel surface.

rainbowdemon.name: Rainbow Demon
rainbowdemon.description: A demon of light, riding the electromagical radiation bands that link the Given World and the Fast Stars. The aloof, terrifying creatures sometimes possess machines and mundane tools to act upon the physical world.

properties.name: Electromagical travel
properties.description: The demon can travel along EM power and communication channels.

properties.name: Electromagical vulnerability
properties.description: The demon is vulnerable to EM and forcefield effects, suffering increased damage [+] and [-] to tests against traps and restraints.

properties.name: Incorporeal
properties.description: The demon has no physical form and is immune to ha attacks. It manifests like a hologram or radiation ghost.

properties.name: Neural disruptor
properties.description: The demon can spend 10 life to rapidly vibrate itself through a deeply folded subatomic dimension, unleashing a painful blast. All adjacent creatures suffer 2d12 ha damage and lose 1 action.

properties.name: Possession
properties.description: A target struck by the demon’s possessive touch makes an aura test against the demon’s ka defence. Failure: it is possessed by the demon. The target can test again each time it is injured.

properties.name: Rainbow field
properties.description: The demon bathes its vicinity in rippling rainbow lights, and nearby creatures make aura or thought tests against its ka defence. Failure: they lose an action that round.

properties.name: Swift as thought
properties.description: The demon gets 4 actions every round and [+] on initiative tests.

rarefurbeastdeextincted.name: Rare Furbeast, De-extincted
rarefurbeastdeextincted.description: A beautiful megafauna predator from one of the long ahistorical mist ages of the Given World. Restored with de-extinction tech and commercialized for the status games of high net-worth-and-moral-value legal persons. Core patterns sourced from the: 1. Andrewsarchid derivative. 2. Basal pachycrocuta. 3. Entelodon variant. 4. Northwar dire canine. 5. Old world liger. 6. Tremarctine hatebear.

properties.name: Luxurious
properties.description: Rider gains [+] vs ba attacks and damage.

properties.name: Jouster
properties.description: Rider gains [+] to attacks with mounted weapons.

properties.name: Pet
properties.description: A very expensive pet.

properties.name: Purr-ma bond
properties.description: Loyal to its legally-certified owner.

properties.name: Smart
properties.description: [+] to getting its way.

properties.name: Terrifying
properties.description: [+] to fear damage.

rebellion.name: Rebel Lion
rebellion.description: Its roar spreads fear and loathing. Its doubts and insecurities fuel strange expeditions.

properties.name: Addictive personality
properties.description: [-] to drug tests.

properties.name: Territorial
properties.description: [+] when fighting to prove they are the king.

regalcobra.name: Regal Cobra
regalcobra.description: The king of snakes teleports through wicker baskets and is superbly adapted to the null-weight of the fast star villages in orbit round the Given World.

properties.name: Neurotoxic venom
properties.description: Incredibly painful, [-] to all tests. Usually fatal without antivenom. After some dozen minutes breathing stops and silence follows.

properties.name: Wickerbond
properties.description: Survives indefinitely in a wicker basket.

properties.name: Wickerjump
properties.description: Spends 1d6 life to teleport from one wicker basket to another within 18 furlongs.

properties.name: Spellbearer
properties.description: Can memorize a single spell. Casts with a magic cost of 1. May cast without being ordered.

retherium.name: Retherium
retherium.description: As any memorialist knows, the original ecosystem of the Builders was not restored on the Given World. This has not stopped life sculptors from re-imagining the fanciful fauna of the Long Long Ago. Great burden beasts include: 1. Bearded megaloceros. 2. Feathered megacerops. 3. Rainbow elasmotherium. 4. Rusty gomphothere. 5. Syncerus bubaline. 6. White palaeoloxodon.

properties.name: Appetite
properties.description: Double rations.

properties.name: Pet
properties.description: A very big pet.

rivergolempomoraclass.name: Rivergolem, “Pomora” Class
rivergolempomoraclass.description: A living, sailing palace built on and in a great aquatic golem. Its paddle limbs and tail propel it up and down the shallow coasts, muddy rivers, and great lakes. Its machine brain remembers times so deep and lost, they might as well be fictions.

properties.name: Armoured
properties.description: [+] vs ha damage.

properties.name: Massive
properties.description: [+] vs non-critical dmg.

properties.name: Powerful
properties.description: [+] vs currents and rapids.

properties.name: Sentient
properties.description: Has own plans.

roamingmicrobiome.name: Roaming Microbiome
roamingmicrobiome.description: An entire biome of arcane microorganisms encased in a gelatinous cell wall. This one has developed a taste for blood through a protogenetic mishap.

properties.name: Protogenetic poisoning
properties.description: On death: affects all in vicinity. Biological creatures must test END or take 1 END damage.

properties.name: Stem cell harvest
properties.description: Researchers can make a medium THO test, then a medium AGI test to harvest some *items.rawstemcells* from a dead microbiome.

properties.name: Walled Garden
properties.description: Whenever the delicate ecological balance within the microbiome encounters a new foreign substance, it takes 1d6 damage.

rollingrock.name: Rolling Rock
rollingrock.description: It needs neither food nor drink nor air. It is almost a perfect organism. Perhaps it is not even an organism.

properties.name: Immobile
properties.description: Needs another creature to carry it.

properties.name: Inertia manipulator
properties.description: As an action, grants [+] or [-] to an adjacent creature’s physical tests by altering its inertial profile. The effect lasts one round.

properties.name: Poet
properties.description: Spells out a new ten-gram poem on its rocky hide every =RAND() days. Each poem is somehow very apt to the moment, yet also quite inhuman.

sableoilblob.name: Sable Oil Blob
sableoilblob.description: Boiling up from between shoreline crevices and oozing down canyons in search of threats to the planet's ecosystem.

properties.name: Ecological defender
properties.description: Deals additional damage equal to the expedition’s disruption total.

properties.name: Electrical discharge
properties.description: Has [area] when in water. [+] vs metal targets. Targets make ka save or an electrical item breaks.

properties.name: Metal eater
properties.description: Metal items break on contact, then the blob heals 1d6.

properties.name: Sable oil source
properties.description: Researchers can make a difficult THO test to harvest some Sable Oil from a dead blob.

sampansempervirens.name: Sampan, “Sempervirens”
sampansempervirens.description: A flat-bottomed speeder grown from a single coco-bateau palm nut. The Salt Dog Thalassocracy planted so many of the engineered palms around the Circle Sea that even now, generations later, it is often better to adapt one of the over-sized seeds than actually build a boat hull.

properties.name: Fast
properties.description: [+] for a boat.

properties.name: Powered
properties.description: Rhincodon-class krill-eater golem engine. Needs to keep moving to stay fed.

properties.name: Smooth
properties.description: [+] vs sea sickness.

sandoctopus.name: Sand Octopus
sandoctopus.description: Adapted to the vast Yellow Desert, the gregarious beagle-sized sand octopus enjoys nothing more than curling up in front of a fire, gently chirping like a parrot.

properties.name: Beak
properties.description: While latched on, it can use its beak to attack (+7 bite 1d6) as a free action.

properties.name: Camouflage
properties.description: It controls its skin colour and can hide in plain sight.

properties.name: Grip
properties.description: Latches on after striking with its tentacles. Strength test to remove.

scavengerraccoon.name: Scavenger Raccoon
scavengerraccoon.description: Looks suspiciously like a quarterling that took off its rocket suit a few minutes ago.

properties.name: Explorer
properties.description: Always finds something halfway useful but also worthless in any pile of trash.

properties.name: Obligate nudist
properties.description: Afraid of cloth and clothes.

skeletalautowagon.name: Skeletal Autowagon
skeletalautowagon.description: A stripped-down, fully sentient autogolem model. Popular with raiders, since it drives itself and requires no outside fuel supply.

properties.name: Fast
properties.description: [+] for a land vehicle.

properties.name: Enduring
properties.description: Can drive without rest. Careful where that leads.

properties.name: Geomantic
properties.description: Feeds on ley lines.

properties.name: Jump
properties.description: Muscular ambi-shocks let it leap three times its height.

properties.name: Nimble
properties.description: [+] to manoeuvres.

properties.name: Sentient
properties.description: It drives itself.

properties.name: Variants
properties.description: Chassis descend from several magineering schools [d6]: 1. Bonework. Mildly necrotic. 2. Brickwork. Clay made flesh with G.E. life-maker tech. 3. Livingstone. Using modified land coral to grow the frames. 4. Steelprint. Printed from raw materials in an auto-factory. 5. True-Plaz. Made the old way, from pre-fabricated plastic sheets. Stylish and expensive. 6. Wireframe. 3D constructs sketched into reality using stuckforce pencils and hard-light panels.

skullfacecow.name: Skullface Cow
skullfacecow.description: Possibly some kind of moschops or other time-reborn visitor from an ancient epoch. Now quite common on the swampy plains and popular with a particular type of exotic animal trainer.

properties.name: Heavy hide
properties.description: Physical damage resistance [-].

properties.name: Transport
properties.description: Can carry 4 sacks.

smokingcamel.name: Smoking Camel
smokingcamel.description: The noble ship of the desert. Graceful, loveable, and quite vicious and stubborn.

properties.name: Accurate
properties.description: [+] to hit nearby targets with spit attack.

properties.name: Aquarius
properties.description: [+] to survival tests in deserts.

properties.name: Smoke cured
properties.description: Ha damage resistance [-].

properties.name: Transport
properties.description: Can carry 2 sacks.

properties.name: Capital pounce
properties.description: Jumps on a target's head, scratching and confusing it for one round (target loses 1 action).

snowlandsledge.name: Snowland Sledge
snowlandsledge.description: The cheapest way to move heavy objects. Popular in fallen eras with local quarterling chiefs moving

properties.name: A drag
properties.description: Requires beasts to pull.

properties.name: Very slow
properties.description: [-][-] except on snow or slipsand.

solarcorgi.name: Solar Corgi
solarcorgi.description: Engineered as hassle-free pet for well-to-do Solar City burgeis conventionalites, the solar corgi soon found favour as a companion in the Yellow Desert and the Voider Colonies thanks to its ability to survive on sunlight alone.

properties.name: Cute
