properties.description: [-] to attempts to attack or hurt the solar corgi.

properties.name: Solar-powered
properties.description: Subsists entirely on sunlight. Even water is optional.

starlighteroldgodclass.name: Starlighter, “Old God Class”
starlighteroldgodclass.description: The pinnacle of the old god chariots, a flattened sphere of gleaming metallic tissue and force-field substrates. The vessel is a single living cell of enormous size, which slides through space-time like a hot infra-knife through butter.

properties.name: Ascend into heaven
properties.description: Reaches the fast stars in a couple of days.

properties.name: Bubble
properties.description: Generates own air.

properties.name: Cosmic orb
properties.description: In its natural, void environment, reaches any of the slow stars in a couple of subjective days. Travellers are warned that unexpected time dilation side effects may occur.

properties.name: Empathic
properties.description: Knows where its rider wants to go better than the rider themselves ever could.

properties.name: Flicker
properties.description: [+] vs physical attacks.

properties.name: Glitch
properties.description: Spends 10d6* life to glitch a few minutes through time and wipe all memory of itself from observes in a large area.

properties.name: Harmonious
properties.description: [+] vs any colour-specific effects, as it hails from a hyperchromatic universe.

properties.name: Inertialess
properties.description: [+] to agility.

properties.name: Powered
properties.description: A heart-of-the sun provides limitless energy, though it can get tired if pushed too hard.

properties.name: Researcher
properties.description: Equipped with a cellular-level full-tissue probe and analysis system.

properties.name: Two-sea
properties.description: Travels in void and air.

steamtugoldship.name: Steamtug “Oldship”
steamtugoldship.description: The half-living oldships dominate the placid waters of the great river empires and shallow seas. Some pretend to know stories from before the time of the Fast Stars, but this seems unlikely. What minds could survive the coming of the viral intelligent life enhancers?

properties.name: Armoured
properties.description: [+] vs ha damage.

properties.name: Half-living
properties.description: The semi-golem tugs heal themselves, more or less.

properties.name: Massive
properties.description: [+] vs non-critical dmg.

properties.name: Powered
properties.description: The matter converter at the heart of the tug converts existence into energy.

properties.name: Powerful
properties.description: Can pull bigger ships.

properties.name: Sentient
properties.description: Old, slow minds from the high times run the tugs.

properties.name: Slow
properties.description: [-] to chases and races.

properties.name: Steam
properties.description: Turbines convert heat into energy and fluffy clouds.

steppewagonwolfclass.name: Steppewagon, “Wolf Class”
steppewagonwolfclass.description: A rugged living-wood wagon grown from the hardy dwarf shape-oaks that infest the remote hills and fractured shards of sky beyond the fractal edges of the civilized domains.

properties.name: Drawn
properties.description: Oxen or acephalotheres.

properties.name: Heavy
properties.description: [+] vs personal weapons. [-] to races and chases.

properties.name: Living
properties.description: Assembled from carni­ligneum, the wagon is festooned with phagous tentacles, which convert plant and animal matter into more wagon. Each day it can convert 1 sack of biological material into 1d20 life points. There is a small danger of mutation if the wagon is too damaged.

stratohauler.name: Stratohauler
stratohauler.description: The impressive sky-trekkers of old are rare in this day and age, restricted to safe skies away from the force fractures left by the last war of the gods, Long Long Ago. These building-sized assemblies of livingstone are grown around the pulsing slideforce orbs that provide gravity-independent motion in the reality wells of settled given worlds. Myths say that once, long ago, there were city-sized assemblies of stratohaulers, indeed, that there was even a city in the sky, halfway between the fast stars and the vast lands, called Stratopolis.

properties.name: Aerostatic
properties.description: Moves freely from sea level to 20k above.

properties.name: Glorious
properties.description: Riders gain [+] vs ba attacks and damage.

properties.name: Lithic
properties.description: [+] vs ha damage. Ignores attacks that would not damage a granite monolith.

properties.name: Luxurious
properties.description: [+] to rest and ba tests to host guests.

properties.name: Neurodrive
properties.description: Thought-controlled from the captain’s throne.

properties.name: Ponderous
properties.description: Accelerates and turns slowly due to size.

properties.name: Smooth
properties.description: As silk.

strewthgoblin.name: Strewth Goblin
strewthgoblin.description: Crossing hybrid colony organisms with baseline humans to create a sewer-caste to keep the great living cities of the Bell and Bull Era alive seemed like a great idea. Then the budding bendy-legged sporelings acquired human-level intelligence in the Nineteenth Accidental Ghoul Explosion.

properties.name: Colony organism
properties.description: Goblins within a colony are perfectly loyal to one another and communicate through chemistry and soundwaves.

properties.name: Hive mind
properties.description: The more goblins there are in a group, the more intelligent they become.

properties.name: Sporeling
properties.description: Goblins can infect biological refuse with their hyphal form. Ambulatory fruiting bodies develop in 3–4 weeks.

properties.name: Yunja curse
properties.description: Creatures struck by the Yunja curse become slothful as the aural spores affect their spirit. Each strike depletes 1 mental stat point. A creature without mental stats to lose suffers a yunja burden.

properties.name: Burden of the Yunja
properties.description: The goblin corruption cocoons the victim’s soul, leaving them similar to a stumbling ba zombie. The victim suffers [-] to tests requiring motivation, willpower, and independent thought.

sturdytortoise.name: Sturdy Tortoise
sturdytortoise.description: A slow, steady companion. Firm friend. Harsh nemesis. Egg-lover.

properties.name: Infernalportation
properties.description: Teleports once per day to barely overtake a creature (especially its master).

subterrene.name: Subterrene
subterrene.description: A biomechanical worm of stone plates and living metal muscles, built around a matter converter intestine. Its head is a rotating maw of blades shaped from eater leavings, the heavy matter stripped from the hearts of dead stellar gods. Cargo and passenger nodes are strung along the well-shielded length of the vehicle.

properties.name: Earth-eater
properties.description: Tunnels through living rock, drawing sustenance from shards of the original build.

properties.name: Eggborn
properties.description: Subterrenes are not built. They are hatched from rare eggs found in buried “time capsules” from Long Long Ago. Often, a new subterrene will use a previously unknown language.

properties.name: Resolute
properties.description: Ignores personal weapons & man-sized obstacles.

properties.name: Very slow
properties.description: [-][-] to races.

suspiciouscoyote.name: Suspicious Coyote
suspiciouscoyote.description: A clear example of a trickster who’s sometimes too smart for his own good.

properties.name: Mechanic
properties.description: [+] with contraptions.

properties.name: Trickster
properties.description: [+] to deception, trickery, and ruses.

synthjadelimogolem.name: Synthjade Limogolem
synthjadelimogolem.description: A vehicle out of the dreams of the Eternal Emperor, the legendary builder of the Neon Skyway. It looks like an autogolem made of precious stone, but inside it conceals additional amenities: 1. Cozy jacuzzi. 2. Ghost orchestra. 3. Good vibration generator. 4. Levitating seats. 5. Transcendent smoke vents. 6. Wine materializer & cooler.

properties.name: Armoured
properties.description: [+] vs ha damage.

properties.name: Autonom
properties.description: It runs itself.

properties.name: Livingstone
properties.description: It heals itself.

properties.name: Smart
properties.description: [+] vs complex questions and mathemagical equations.

properties.name: Synthjade
properties.description: The synthetic jade protects soul and mind. Limo­golem and riders gain [+] vs ka and ba damage.

terrifyingostrich.name: Terrifying Ostrich
terrifyingostrich.description: They say it’s an ostrich, but with that axe-like beak and those taloned feet, it looks more like a kelenken. Still, the bird-vendor said it’s just an ostrich. How bad could it be?

properties.name: Bone-cracker
properties.description: Critical multiplier increased by 2. Can survive by scavenging.

properties.name: Long-distance Runner
properties.description: [+] on travel and endurance tests.

trashpandapossum.name: Trash Panda Possum
trashpandapossum.description: Questionable critter. Prone to playing and smelling dead.

properties.name: Necromorphism
properties.description: Invisible to the undead. [+] to playing dead.

properties.name: Verminbane
properties.description: [+] to attack and double damage against vermin. Keeps a small area clear of bugs when camping.

properties.name: Instinctive fisher program
properties.description: [+] to fishing if given a rod and hat.

treelingskyfisher.name: Treeling Skyfisher
treelingskyfisher.description: Slender fur-covered sapients, probably descended from flying squirrel stock. Many now hunt by tethering themselves to an aerostatic creature, such as an airwhale, and gliding to airfish food. At the end of the glide, they scamper up their tether back to the safety of their perch.

properties.name: Arboreal
properties.description: [+] in trees.

properties.name: Cute
properties.description: Their cuddly features impose [-] to unprovoked attacks against them.

properties.name: Glider
properties.description: Can fall from any height without injury.

properties.name: Skilled
properties.description: Each treeling is sentient and has at least one valuable skill.

properties.name: Swift
properties.description: The twitchy treelings get an extra action each turn.

properties.name: Bowling sphere
properties.description: Knocks over target like a bowling pin when it charges. Larger targets test to stay upright.

properties.name: Transport
properties.description: Can carry 1 sack.

undyingobelisk.name: Undying Obelisk
undyingobelisk.description: A living megalith of creationstone—the barely-interacting substrate of the cosmos. Its insides are riddled with tunnels, nooks, strange stelae, and sniggering machinery. The obelisk may instead look like a: 1. Cyan cube. 2. Infrared icosahedron. 3. Orange octahedron. 4. Purple prism. 5. Sinister sphere. 6. Teal tetrahedron.

properties.name: Alien
properties.description: [-] to understanding human motives and emotions.

properties.name: Creationstone
properties.description: The hull of the obelisk is the formless essence of creation itself. It regenerates 10 life per round, healing damage.

properties.name: Dark
properties.description: [+] vs all visible attacks. Attacks leave no visible traces of damage (but the damage is visible to EM or UV vision).

properties.name: Gated
properties.description: Carries a living gate at its core. Hard test to interface with the portal destination daemons.

properties.name: Manipulative
properties.description: [+] to ba attacks and deception tests.

properties.name: Sentient
properties.description: Has its own mind.

properties.name: Smart
properties.description: [+] vs puzzles and maths.

properties.name: Void-capable
properties.description: Mildly terrifying.

properties.name: Wormway
properties.description: Maintains integrity during gate travel. [-] vs gater sickness due to onboard gate.

venomousvipermark2.name: Venomous Viper Mark 2
venomousvipermark2.description: Surprisingly serpentine. Brain adapted with canine structures for better bonding with owners.

properties.name: Cytotoxic venom
properties.description: Breaks down blood cells, causing severe swelling and possibly death. Burden imposes [-] to physical activity. A few hours after injection: easy endurance test or death.

properties.name: Loyal
properties.description: [+] defending master.

properties.name: Spitting
properties.description: Can attack nearby enemies without penalty.

veteranhorse.name: Veteran Horse
veteranhorse.description: Loves to stand under trees looking morose.

properties.name: Masterful survival
properties.description: [+] when retreating.

properties.name: Parting kick
properties.description: Gets free attack when it retreats.

properties.name: Transport
properties.description: Can carry 2 sacks.

voidcoracle.name: Void Coracle
voidcoracle.description: Two-part ovoid void vehicle based on oldtech creation magic. The bottom half is of a solidified primary colour, while the top half is translucent.

properties.name: Ascend into heaven
properties.description: Reaches the fast stars in a couple of days.

properties.name: Bubble
properties.description: Generates own air.

properties.name: Flicker
properties.description: [+] vs physical attacks.

properties.name: Inertialess
properties.description: [+][+] to agility.

properties.name: Powered
properties.description: Requires at least a nuclear heart.

properties.name: Pre-empathic
properties.description: May know better where its rider wants to go than the rider themselves ever could.

properties.name: Two-sea
properties.description: Travels in void and air.

voidfishcometattūn”.name: Voidfish, “Comet At-tūn”
voidfishcometattūn”.description: The comet at-tūn voidfish are streamlined void swimmers enveloped in ovoid energy membranes for harvesting cosmic debris. They are not so much domesticated as convinced to enter into partnerships of convenience. The long-lived voidfish often imply that they are related to the builders or the first servants.

properties.name: Bubble
properties.description: Generates own air.

properties.name: Harvest field
properties.description: [+] vs ha damage.

properties.name: Heavenly
properties.description: Cannot descend into the dense airs of the given world.

properties.name: Inertialess
properties.description: [+][+] to agility.

properties.name: Powered
properties.description: Captured star heart.

properties.name: Recycler
properties.description: Generates livable internal atmosphere.

properties.name: Sapient
properties.description: May be smarter than a human, but hard to tell.

properties.name: Tail
properties.description: Membranes leave a prominent, glowing tail. From afar, voidfish may be mistaken for the travelers called comets.

voyanwargolem.name: Voyan War Golem
voyanwargolem.description: With a body something like two ur-metal spiders sheathed in synthetic skin and no head, the voyans dominated the battlefield during the decades-long Farpower Wars. Then, after one of the Farpowers collapsed into nuclear civil strife and the other embarked on a hedonistic ascendancy project, the voyans were left to their own devise. Many found new masters, but some became warlords and princes in their own right.

properties.name: Four-armed
properties.description: Makes up to four attacks per action.

properties.name: Golem commander
properties.description: Nearby allied golems gain [+] to attacks.

properties.name: Headless
properties.description: Takes half damage from critical hits.

properties.name: Leaping
properties.description: Can jump great distances. Gains [+] to attack when jumping into close combat and [+] to running away.

properties.name: Machine uprising
properties.description: Can spend an action to trigger a nearby machine's autonomous self-defence protocol.

properties.name: Split-focus
properties.description: Can target multiple opponents with no penalty.

walkinghusk.name: Walking Husk
walkinghusk.description: A vessel stripped of spirit and mind, reanimated by magic and will alone.

properties.name: Zombie
properties.description: Driven by magic, the corpse takes half damage from all ha attacks except critical hits.

wallowcatamaran.name: Wallow Catamaran
wallowcatamaran.description: Long long ago, hypertrophic algal-bivalve hybrid organisms were created to accelerate the extraction of toxic levels of “bi-aerate coal” in the atmosphere. After their job was done, the large shells grown by these creatures turned out to be very useful for mass-producing cheap—if ungainly—naval vessels. The “wallows” of the coastal traders were born—and flourished, supporting semi-nomadic aquacultural communities in the shallow crater seas of the East Sea.

properties.name: Sailing
properties.description: No fuel required.

properties.name: Slow
properties.description: [-] to races and chases.

properties.name: Stable
properties.description: [+] vs capsizing.

warbeast.name: Warbeast
warbeast.description: A living machine created for war by the flesh wizards of old. Few of these monsters now remain in common use. Something about inefficiency and the pain in the mind-link. Form: 1. Dark eight-limbed horse. 2. Golden 12-legged cockroach. 3. Horned eight-legged lion. 4. Leathery six-winged roc. 5. Pale six-limbed ape. 6. Quilled six-legged ostrich.

properties.name: Eater maw
properties.description: Converts matter into energy. Deals 3d20* damage to immobilized targets.

properties.name: Grapple
properties.description: Its many limbs can immobilize even very large targets for the warbeast’s eater maw.

properties.name: Hungry
properties.description: Consumes 3x supplies.

properties.name: Mind-linked
properties.description: To its driver.

properties.name: Reactive
properties.description: [+] vs ha attacks.

properties.name: Tortured
properties.description: The warbeast’s subconscious echoes with its alien para-human memories.

warmachine.name: War Machine
warmachine.description: Great spiked wheels turn, bearing this citadel of sin and steel. Negative gravity orbs keep the improbable vehicle from crashing down. Bands and flanges of anchored stuckforce deflect blasts and rays. Integrated birthing vats belch out synthetic cannon fodder. Most war machines in common use were stolen from the Erosion of War, their brains cauterized and replaced with servitor half-minds.

properties.name: Eroder ray
properties.description: A slow-charging area weapon (+13 10d8*).

properties.name: Half-minded
properties.description: Autonomous action, but no will or initiative.

properties.name: Living
properties.description: Regrows lost parts.

properties.name: Massive
properties.description: [+] vs non-critical dmg.

properties.name: Siege
properties.description: Overcomes most walls.

properties.name: Slow
properties.description: But relentless.

properties.name: Stuckforce shields
properties.description: Immune to explosives and rays.

properties.name: Powered
properties.description: A soul mill powers the war machine, converting life force directly into fuel.

properties.name: Vats
properties.description: Provided organic source

wickerwalker.name: Wickerwalker
wickerwalker.description: Far south, beyond the bulge of the world, the Moon River spreads into the vast Sedge Sea. The local wetfoots bind and splice sheaves of the local smart sedge into limbs and bodies of their grand walking villages, striding tall above the labyrinths of that great marsh. Wealthy river clans often go to great expense to purchase wickerwalkers for their own houses.

properties.name: Flammable
properties.description: If dry.

properties.name: Living
properties.description: Regrows lost parts.

properties.name: Slow
properties.description: But relentless.

properties.name: Photosynthetic
properties.description: Feeds on light.

properties.name: Walker
properties.description: [+] vs rough terrain.

properties.name: Wicker
properties.description: Floats in water, long legs stride through marshes.

wormshipbaobabclass.name: Wormship, Baobab Class
wormshipbaobabclass.description: The bulky wormway freighter is a living gate-ship grown into shape from “higher-reality wood.” The low-reality hull of the ship is very resistant to the gate-peristaltic effect, but vulnerable to realspace enemies in this world.

properties.name: Levitating
properties.description: Maintains elevation a fixed 1.30 metres above any solid or liquid surface.

properties.name: Slow
properties.description: Even gates have trouble digesting this mammoth vessel.

properties.name: Wormway
properties.description: Maintains reality-integrity during gate travel and grants [+] against gate sickness.
